imdb.plot outline: All good things come in threes. Twice already Olaf Schubert tried to improve the world, but it has not worked, contrary to expectations. This time Olaf Schubert has long wondered how this could work to the betterment of the world. His conclusion: It's easy! All people need to be happy - and that is precisely the objective of his mission. Olaf's sacred promise is that he will make everyone happy.
imdb.title: Olaf verbessert die Welt!
plot: The Schubert-Liveshow.::Item was not in English.

All good things come in threes. Twice already Olaf Schubert tried to improve the world, but it has not worked, contrary to expectations. This time Olaf Schubert has long wondered how this could work to the betterment of the world. His conclusion: It's easy! All people need to be happy - and that is precisely the objective of his mission. Olaf's sacred promise is that he will make everyone happy.::Item was not in English.
